name: BugTopia
summary: BugTopia as a completely browser-based real-time MMO, with all the gameplay features you would expect from a desktop RPG. Players will take on the role of individual insects in a fantasy setting and explore the world of Harendar, engaging in epic battles, questing for riches and experience, fighting other players in organized events or random encounters, defeating powerful dungeon monsters and much, much more. It will boast an easy interface, skill system and friendly graphics.
info:
• 平台: OnWeb
  • 游戏类型: MMPRPG
  • 游戏引擎: HTML5
  • 游玩人数: 多人在线
  • 官方网站: http://www.bugtopia.net
